title: Wtf? Jinx ults while stunned?
body:
Dear Riot team,

Can you explain to me PLEASE why (as Vayne) i tumbled into jinx getting the perfect angle, apparently as i e'd Jinx into the wall she must have been mid ult because she managed to get her ult off after being stunned for a good .5 seconds. Is this some kind of bug that being stunned somehow doesn't stop Jinx's ult? If it is NOT a bug, then you really need to nerf that because not only is that a extremely huge troll, but it's insanely OP and literally costed me my game. I can 100% guarantee this is no misjudgment on my end when i say, Jinx finished casting her ultimate mid stun.

replies.body: Excluding channeling spells, you can't interrupt a spell, or autoattack during its cast time with a stun. You can if you kill them.
In regard to this, do you know why lux's ult hitbox allows her to ult people behind her? Is this just a long time bug that's never been fixed?
What do you mean by hitbox behind her?

If lux ults in front of her, and a champion is positioned directly behind her, the ult will still hit them, even though I don't think it's supposed to. It's always been like that for as long as I can remember.

I've grown to accept that Jinx/Lux/Ez ults are just extended cast times and can't be cancelled with CC. What I still can't get past, though, is that some spells have extremely short channel times, and therefore *can* be cancelled, presumably by accident. The example I'm most salty about on this is Kennen's ult. It should basically be an instant-cast ability, or at the very least shouldn't be able to be cancelled. But since it's technically a super-short channel, I've had it cancelled mid-cast by very unfortunately timed CC...
Thanks for the information Rito, i appreciate it. Keep up the great work you've created a great game. I'm sure i speak for everyone when i say congratulations (:

you can stop her with the best cc: death.

to be honest tho, this is probably the least offensive thing that jinx does.

Jinx CC can save her from a diving champion if they have to use a dash to get in. Maybe {{champion:51}} can too but not many.

Don't get me wrong, I don't think Jinx is completely out of control, however if I had to make some complaints, I'd say her early mana gating is too negligible, and her rockets are just too effective once she gets a lot of attack speed.

As one of the reds said, it would be cool if her rockets were powerful but much slower attack rate-wise, but once she activates her passive they get faster.

But other than high AS rockets and early mana non-issues, I would agree that she is in a pretty good spot.

Is this the same on minions/monsters too?

When I jungle Panth I use his W to(I thought) cancel autos of the big monsters.  But, on blue buff for instance, I would wait until he actually starts swinging to stun him.

It seemed to work...
This is called CC buffering and it is an intended mechanic.
